洩.definition: (bound form) to leak out; to discharge; (fig.) to divulge

洩勁.definition: to lose heart; to feel discouraged

洩氣.definition: to leak (gas); to be discouraged; to despair; (disparaging) pathetic; to vent one's anger; (of a tire) to be flat

洩洪.definition: to release flood water; flood discharge

洩漏.definition: (of a liquid or gas) to leak; to divulge; to leak (information)

洩瀉.definition: loose bowels; diarrhea; to have the runs

洩私憤.definition: to vent personal spite; to act out of malice (esp. of crime)
